content: this legal text discusses the division of ownership of a building located in municipality loreto between two individuals mr ff and mr anc the building consists of multiple apartments a garage and a cellar the cadastral data and descriptions of each unit are provided in the text it is mentioned that there were some errors in the previous deeds which have been rectified the parties have agreed to divide the ownership of the building into two equal shares with each party receiving specific units the value of each share is stated as euro 90000 the text also mentions the sale of a piece of land by mr anc the document is signed by the parties and witnesses
